```{r, message=F}
library(here)

source(here("base","src.R"))
```

```{r}
beta.summary <- readRDS(here("processed_data", "beta_summary.rds"))
```

```{r}
beta.summary %>% filter(species=="D" & temp %in% c(15, 20, 25)) %>% ggplot(.,aes(x=trt, y = beta.est, color = temp)) +
  geom_point(aes(), position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = beta.025, ymax = beta.975), position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  theme_minimal()

beta.summary %>% ggplot(.,aes(x=trt, y = beta.est, color = temp)) +
  geom_point(aes(), position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) + 
  geom_errorbar(aes(ymin = beta.025, ymax = beta.975), position = position_dodge(width = 0.5)) +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 75, vjust = 0.5))
```
